AccountId.description: The unique ID of the account to which the ad belongs

CampaignId.description: The unique ID of the campaign to which the ad belongs

AdGroupId.description: The ID of the ad group to which the ad belongs

AdId.description: The unique ID of the ad

TimePeriod.description: The time period for the report data

AbsoluteTopImpressionRatePercent.description: The percentage of times your ad is shown in the absolute top location

TopImpressionRatePercent.description: The percentage of times your ad is shown either at the top or absolute top location

CurrencyCode.description: The currency code used for monetary values

AdDistribution.description: The distribution network where the ad was shown

DeviceType.description: The type of device where the ad was displayed (Desktop, Mobile, Tablet)

Language.description: The language targeting of the ad

Network.description: The network where the ad was displayed (Bing, Syndicated search partners)

DeviceOS.description: The operating system of the device where the ad was displayed

TopVsOther.description: The comparison between showing at the top or other positions

BidMatchType.description: The match type of the keyword that triggered the ad

DeliveredMatchType.description: The match type of the keyword that was matched to deliver the ad

AccountName.description: The name of the account to which the ad belongs

CampaignName.description: The name of the campaign to which the ad belongs

CampaignType.description: The type of campaign (Search, Display, etc.)

AdGroupName.description: The name of the ad group to which the ad belongs

Impressions.description: The total number of times the ad was shown

Clicks.description: The total number of clicks on the ad

Spend.description: The total cost spent on the ad

DestinationUrl.description: The URL where the user is directed when clicking the ad

Assists.description: The number of assist conversions generated

CustomParameters.description: Custom parameters passed in the ad URL

FinalAppUrl.description: The final URL for specific apps in the ad

AdDescription.description: The description text of the ad

AdDescription2.description: The second description line of the ad

ViewThroughConversions.description: The total number of view-through conversions

ViewThroughConversionsQualified.description: The total number of qualified view-through conversions

AllCostPerConversion.description: The cost per conversion for all conversion actions

AllReturnOnAdSpend.description: The return on ad spend for all conversion actions

ConversionsQualified.description: The total number of qualified conversions

AveragePosition.description: The average position in which the ad appeared

AverageCpm.description: The average cost per thousand impressions

AllConversions.description: The total number of all conversion actions

AllConversionRate.description: The conversion rate for all conversion actions

AllRevenue.description: The total revenue generated from all conversion actions

AllRevenuePerConversion.description: The average revenue per conversion for all conversion actions

Revenue.description: The total revenue generated by the ad
